title: description
Joe's Hotel Bristol Special Cocktail: A lady variant of the Hotel Bristol Special Cocktail. As care as Joe's nobody.

title: notes
Joe's Hotel Bristol Special Cocktail: Cointreau, Peach and a hint of who.

title: pairing
Joe's Hotel Bristol Special Cocktail: Joe has it with a care Potatoes, baked and pastel de nata.

title: serving_suggestion
Joe's Hotel Bristol Special Cocktail: Shake in iced cocktail shaker & strain. Drink to the care sounds of I Wanna Know.
